column5: Would you recommend the grammar that you worked with to future students of LIN 360 (on the merits of its clarity, organization, etc.)?
column6: 1. Which of the following morphological types does your language fall into *primarily*?
column7: 2. What sorts of morphological word-formation strategies does your language use?
column8: 3. Which of these best describes the frequency of different word-formation strategies in your language?
column9: 4. What is(/are) the basic word order(s) of your language?
column10: 5. How does your language pattern with respect to headedness?
